Uses of Package
spaska.classifiers.util

  • Packages that use spaska.classifiers.util 
    Package Description
    spaska.classifiers.util
    A package that contains utilities that helps us implement the classifiers.
    spaska.statistics
    A package that contains statistics that are taken throughout the framework.
  • Classes in spaska.classifiers.util used by spaska.classifiers.util 
    Class and Description
    Condition
    A condition class that is used when building tree classifiers.
    ContinuousValueService
    Given some instances and their *distinguish* numeric attributes, this service will determine the point of splitting the instances into two groups that best represent their classes.
    DatasetService
    A convenient service over a data set object to enable some bulk operations.
    Node
    Represents a node in tree based classifiers.
    Sign
    Represents condition sign.
  • Classes in spaska.classifiers.util used by spaska.statistics 
    Class and Description
    DatasetService
    A convenient service over a data set object to enable some bulk operations.
